Package yahtzee

package yahtzee
  • Class
    Description
    ScoreUpdate
    This class is the object passed to observers when a score is recorded.
    YahtzeeCategory
    This enum represents the different scoring categories in Yahtzee and provides methods to calculate the score for each category based on the dice rolled.
    YahtzeeController
    This class defines methods to interact with the Yahtzee model, serving as the controller in the MVC design.
    YahtzeeDie
    This class represents a single die in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeInstance
    This class represents a saved instance of a Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeModel
    This class manages the game state for the Yahtzee game, serving as the model in the MVC design.
    YahtzeePlayer
    This class represents a player in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeScorecard
    This class represents a player's scorecard in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeView
    This class represents the view component of the Yahtzee game.
